author: cnbc.com
title: ReneSola Files 2017 Annual Report on Form 20-F
text:
SHANGHAI, May 3, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- ReneSola Ltd ("ReneSola" or "the Company") ( www.renesolapower.com ) (NYSE: SOL), a leading solar project developer and operator, today announced that it filed its Annual Report on Form 20-F for the year ended December 31, 2017 with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on April 30, 2018. The Annual Report on Form 20-F can be accessed on ReneSola's investor relations website at http://ir.renesolapower.com or on the SEC's website at www.sec.gov .
ReneSola will provide its shareholders and ADS holders with hard copies free of charge upon request. Requests should be directed to ir@renesolapower.com or by mail to ReneSola Ltd, Attn: Investor Relations, 7/F, Block B, Future Land Holdings Tower, No. 5, Lane 388, Zhongjiang Road, Putuo District, Shanghai 200062, People's Republic of China.
About ReneSola
Founded in 2005, and listed on the New York Stock Exchange in 2008, ReneSola (NYSE: SOL) is an international leading brand of solar project developer and operator. Leveraging its global presence and solid experience in the industry, ReneSola is well positioned to develop green energy projects with attractive return around the world. For more information, please visit www.renesolapower.com .
